text: is a professional Japanese baseball player. He plays pitcher for the Yomiuri Giants. On November 16, 2018, he was selected Yomiuri Giants roster at the 2018 MLB Japan All-Star Series exhibition game against MLB All-Stars. Tone has a Japanese father and a Filipino mother. ==References== ==External links== * NPB.com Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese baseball players Category:Japanese people of Filipino descent Category:Nihon University alumni Category:Nippon Professional Baseball pitchers Category:Baseball people from Kyoto Prefecture Category:Yomiuri Giants players
title: Chiaki Tone
